about_the_game:
A fantasy world is waiting for you! Work your magic with the Magic World Set.
Place your characters in completely different surroundings with the ‘Game of Thrones’-like backgrounds. Use the soundtracks to create an enchanting atmosphere and apply frames to your witchcraft.

This set includes 4 themed packs:
  • Fantasy
  • Fire Dragon
  • Fantasy Sound Pack
  • Fantasy Intro

In this set, you’ll find:
  • 6 titles
  • 28 stickers
  • 5 backgrounds
  • 10 transitions
  • 8 intros
  • 2 frames
  • 11 sounds

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus 2021.
detailed_description:
A fantasy world is waiting for you! Work your magic with the Magic World Set.
Place your characters in completely different surroundings with the ‘Game of Thrones’-like backgrounds. Use the soundtracks to create an enchanting atmosphere and apply frames to your witchcraft.

This set includes 4 themed packs:
  • Fantasy
  • Fire Dragon
  • Fantasy Sound Pack
  • Fantasy Intro

In this set, you’ll find:
  • 6 titles
  • 28 stickers
  • 5 backgrounds
  • 10 transitions
  • 8 intros
  • 2 frames
  • 11 sounds

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus 2021.

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Editor Plus 2021 - Video Editing Software

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
